attributes.action: Change the Mental health system waiting times and referrals ect
attributes.additional_details: Because the wait times at the moment is around 3 YEARS for this type of therapy
attributes.background: Employment of more specifically qualified staff for step 4 therapy and drastically reduce waiting times

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament are not directly responsible for the delivery of NHS mental health services, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for all mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634345

Decisions about what staff to employ are a matter for individual NHS trusts, not the Government or Parliament.
